summary: Guards will no longer chase you down and ask you to stop Shouting
descriptionHtml:
This is a possible beginning of removing many annoying things in Skyrim.

I got so tired of having guards chase me down and ask me to stop shouting so I made this.
This initial version only removes the guards harassing  you for shouting. (as it should be since... I am DragonBorn and not subject to their petty fears)

It is quasi elegant as it eliminates the conditional variable.  If someone has another method of outright removing a script call please post it.  That would be the most elegant method.

I plan to remove the people complaining about the spells I am using next.  (Get away from me with at fire, this wont end well, get away from me with that magic... etc etc.
I will take requests if you have any.

Install:
Drop into your Data folder.  The directory structure is set properly so should be nmm compatible.

Uninstall:
remove GuardsNoShoutStop.esp from your data folder
author: RabidNode
